name: Baldi's Smacking Simulator
description:
Note: This Is A Fangame, And All Baldi's Basics Content Belong To Basically Games.

Hey, You! Are You Sick And Tired Of Being Pushed Around And Smacked (With A Ruler) By Baldi? Do You Ever Get Tired Of Even Running From Him? Or Do You Wish That You, As A Student In Here School, Want To Go Back Home? Well, Have We Turned The Tables For You! In This Game, You Can Become Baldi And P̵͎̐u̵̎ͅn̵̳̈́i̷̻̖͎͚̕ͅs̸̳͈̱͈̦̖̓̍̓̈h̶̠͔̹̩̲̍ͅ C̵̡͔͆̉̉̓͘͝͝h̸̩̮̙͂̍ḯ̵̘̠̺̰̠̩̫̌́͊̎̀̏͐l̸̺̼̣̲̞̞̘̻͐͐̓̅̂̄d̷̮̬̳̀̐́͜͝r̸̘̜̗̙̾̃́̊̄̎͘̕͝é̶̡̡͕̥̹̩̥͎̺̝̰̎͜ͅn̵̜̗̰̩͚̼̮̐̏̋͑̐͜ͅHEY! Billy, WHAT Are You Doing Out Of Class?! We Have An Exam! ...Wait... Is THIS What You Think Of Me?! YOU Think I'm A Mentally Deranged Bald Man Who Hurts You Children?! Well, I̸͚̖͊ K̸͓̮̜͚̮̘͝n̷̰̯̙̬͉̼̱̈́̅̌̎͝͝o̷͍͓̱̞̦̮̜̽w̴̻̳͔͎̘̰̓͐̚̚͝͝͝ͅ ̸̭̘̲͙͊͊T̵͚̫̋h̴͉̻͇̮̥̓͜e̸͉̻̙̓̔̃͆̆̕͝͝ C̵̛̠͒̈́̓̂̿̚h̶̺̬͓̬̼̱̪̿̉͜i̴̠͝l̸̢̡̡̛̼̠͖̳̲̰̥͚͙͈̒͌̊̈̽̏̕̚̚d̷͎͈̙̥̠̆ ̸̡̛͍͔̯͙̲͓̙͚̱̈́͌̆̋͘͠͝Ẅ̶̡͍̞̖̞̗͎͈͗͘̕͜͝͠h̴̡̙̘̬̱̼̥̗̺̄͜͜o̸͈̠͚̳̣͇̹̟̝͐͆̑̉̒̑͜ ̶̨̢̩̠͖͙̙̱̬̜̾̎͗̍̀̊͆̓̀̇͌͜͝͠͝D̶̢̛̹̥͚͕̠̗̦͌͑̅̒̐Ȩ̶̡̬̻̗̺͖̫͈͕̫̥͍̻̅̈́́̀̀͋͐̏́̌͝S̷̨̘͚͛E̵̬̹͎̥͉̻͙͉̖͉͔͂̾͜ͅṚ̸͖̼͑̑͋̀̍̽̓͛͝V̴̭̦̯̗̦̩͚̳͎̞͚̼̗̭̦͓̻̾̂̓͐̊̐͋̓̑͌͘͜͜͜͝ͅÉ̷̘͕̣̱̟̖̝͙̱̦̈́̒̃̉̄̏̈́͗̂̍͑̂͛̀̾͌̏͂͘͠ͅS̷͙̗̺̮͚̟̩̤̪̗̼̳̯̈́͒͌̆̽͗͆̽̀̔̓̏͌̆̚͝͝ ̵̢̧̢̰̯͉̺̩̼̫̘͕̬̟͚̾͛͑̔̇́̉̐̌͗͑͘̕ͅT̷̢̛̛̺͓͍̗̥͉̝̰̙̼̳̳͙̼͕̀̎͑́̉̈́͑̆̓̌̾̓̕͜͝͠O̷͖̤̘͓͙̠͎̹̗̣̼̒͜ ̷̠̺̾̍͒̒̿͆́͝Ḃ̴̛͚̳̩̙͐̈́͑͋̈́͛͛̂́͌͌̈́͆͌̿͘͝Ę̵̪̲̝̳̟̹͎̹͓̏͋̓̎̉̑͛̊̀̔͛̀̓̽̍̔̕͝S̷̢̨̡̨̠͚̜͉̞̥̮̝̲̜͇͕͔͉̏̒̔͋̀̋̈́̈̈̚͜͝ͅL̵̢͔̦͖̼͍̬̟̘̹̪͎͙͚͓̀̈́̈́̇̆̈́̀͐̄̇̽̏̕͜͝Ą̸̡̧̳̬̹̫̖̠̭̯̳̤̜͕̲̒̈̽̅̾̎̒̅̀̒͘͜͠ͅP̷̧͎̳̣͓̱̣͕̻̓̈́̋̃͒̉̈͛̽̆͐͛̚͠P̸̢̫̞̳̗̻̂͋̌͑͋̿̍̓̒̾̍̾̌̐̀͒͊͂͗͜͝͝E̸͓͇̬̒̔̎̄̈́D̷̨̧̙̭̜̅̽̂͗̐̀̅To Your Heart's Content! You Even Get Shiny Quarters For Doing So! Now Guarenteed To Be More FuN!

Controls And Abilities:

Use Your Mouse Cursor (Or Finger) To Manuver The Direction You Want Baldi To Go. Click (Or Tap) To Slap! It's All Simple From Here, Isn't It? There's Also Some Abilities That You Can Activate To Up Your Quarter Count!

      Dash: Once Clicked, A Countdown Will Start So That You Can Get Your Direction  Ready. Then, ZIP! Baldi Will Speed In That Direction! Recovery Time: 4 Seconds

      Shock Circle: Click This Baby And Baldi Will Summon A Spinning Bolt From His Ruler To Take Down Crowds Of Students! Recovery Time: 4 Seconds

     Quarter Multiplier: The Power Will Be Very Subtle At First, But Notice The Quarter Counter! Every Student That You Punish Will Give You TWICE The Quarters! Power Time: 8 Seconds

     Dismissal: This Ability Is Powerful For Quarters, So It Takes 64 Seconds To Be Available. Once Clicked, A Crowd Of Students Will Show Up And You Can Take Them Down! Recovery Time: 64 Seconds

Rulers:
Want A New Style For Your Sticks? You Can Get Some At The Ingame Shop! They Can Give You Boosts For Your Speed And Your Shock Radius!

Music Options:
Tired Of Certain Sounds And Music Getting In The Way? Or Do You Want To Never Hear The Sounds Again? We Got Your Back, Because This Game Has 5 Different Sound Filters For Your Likeness!

    Normal: Just The Normal Sounds And Music Options In The Game. Nothing Different.

     Music Only: Are You A Music Lover Or Maker? This Option Will Mute Any Sound Except For The Music!

     Sounds Only: Want A True Baldi's Basics Sounding Experience? Enable This Option To Mute Only The Music!

      Characters Only: Do You Not Like Those Buzzing And Beeping Noises Baldi Makes From His Ruler When He Catches A Student? Enable This Option To Only Hear The Characters. Even Baldi!

      Mute: Hate All Sounds In The World? Or Do You Want A Silent Experience? This Option Mutes EVERYTHING!


Game, Music, And Vector Models Made By: hudmaceachern
